description: gc: type-checking and initialization of recursive types.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2011/11/29 00:43:50, remyoudompheng wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

This is incomplete work as it still needs to solve the issue originally described in issue 2203 (initialization of recursive literals containing &x[i] expressions).

Rémy.

subject: code review 5445050: gc: type-checking and initialization of recursive types.
